timeOffset.name: timeOffset
timeOffset.desc: Offset in seconds for the animation timeline.

timeSpeed.name: timeSpeed
timeSpeed.desc: Multiplier controlling how fast the animation progresses.

uvScale.name: uvScale
uvScale.desc: Scales the UV to zoom the noise pattern in or out.

noiseScale.name: noiseScale
noiseScale.desc: Controls the spatial frequency of the procedural noise.

contrast.name: contrast
contrast.desc: Adjusts the difference between light and dark areas.
